- **Data Collation:** Data from various sources will be collated monthly. This process will involve cross-referencing data points to ensure consistency and accuracy.
- **Reporting:** Quarterly reports will be generated and reviewed by the monitoring team. These reports will be shared with stakeholders and regulatory bodies as required.

- **Calibration Procedures:** All monitoring equipment will be calibrated according to the manufacturer’s specifications and industry standards. Calibration will be conducted biannually by certified technicians. Calibration records will be maintained and reviewed during internal audits.
